amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Afghan National Security Force by $2.615 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 113-170 to cut $2,615,000,000 from the Afghan Security Forces Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 276 (Roll no. 391).
